Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.

In the text below, text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

The standard-issue pack you received after basic training.[br/][br/]The pack includes:[br/]A [AbilityGreen]Laser Rifle[/AbilityGreen] that deals repeated [DamageThermal/] Thermal damage.[br/]A [AbilityGreen]Basic Grenade[/AbilityGreen] that deals [DamagePhysical/] Kinetic damage in an area and staggers those hit.

The standard-issue pack you received after basic training.[br/][br/]The pack includes:[br/]An [AbilityGreen]Arc Projector[/AbilityGreen] that deals repeated [DamageWave/] Arc damage.[br/]An [AbilityGreen]Arc Grenade[/AbilityGreen] that deals [DamageWave/] Arc damage and staggers those hit.

The standard-issue pack you received after basic training.[br/][br/]The pack includes:[br/]A [AbilityGreen]Thrax Rifle[/AbilityGreen] that deals repeated [DamageBio/] Biochemical damage.[br/]A [AbilityGreen]Psi-stone of Dissonance[/AbilityGreen] that deals [DamagePsyche/] Psionic damage in an area.

The standard-issue pack you received after basic training.[br/][br/]The pack includes:[br/]A [AbilityGreen]Hunting Bow[/AbilityGreen] that deals repeated [DamageBio/] Biochemical damage and has a chance to poison.[br/]A [AbilityGreen]Thermal Grenade[/AbilityGreen] that deals [DamageThermal/] Thermal damage in an area and has a chance to burn those hit.

The standard-issue pack you received after basic training.[br/][br/]The pack includes:[br/]A [AbilityGreen]Spike Gun[/AbilityGreen] that fires a single, powerful shot that deals [DamagePhysical/] Kinetic damage.[br/]A [AbilityGreen]Basic Grenade[/AbilityGreen] that deals [DamagePhysical/] Kinetic damage in an area and staggers those hit.

The standard-issue pack you received after basic training.[br/][br/]The pack includes:[br/]A [AbilityGreen]Pulse Repeater[/AbilityGreen] that deals repeated [DamageWave/] Arc damage.[br/]A [AbilityGreen]PsiTec Grenade[/AbilityGreen] that deals [DamagePsyche/] Psionic damage in an area and has a chance to cripple those hit.

The pack you received after Close Combat training.[br/][br/]This advanced training gives you the following skills:[br/][AbilityGreen]Close Quarter Specialist I[/AbilityGreen] - increases damage dealt when using Melee Weapons.[br/][AbilityGreen]Vitality I[/AbilityGreen] - increases your maximum [hp/].[br/][br/]The pack includes:[br/]A [AbilityGreen]Laser Sword[/AbilityGreen] that deals repeated [DamageThermal/] Thermal damage at close range.[br/]An [AbilityGreen]Imperial Revolver[/AbilityGreen] that deals [DamagePhysical/] Kinetic damage in a single burst.

The pack you received after Close Combat training.[br/][br/]This advanced training gives you the following skills:[br/][AbilityGreen]Close Quarter Specialist I[/AbilityGreen] - increases damage dealt when using Melee Weapons.[br/][AbilityGreen]Vitality I[/AbilityGreen] - increases your maximum [hp/].[br/][br/]The pack includes:[br/]A [AbilityGreen]Arc Sword[/AbilityGreen] that deals repeated [DamageWave/] Arc damage at close range.[br/]A [AbilityGreen]Imperial Pistol[/AbilityGreen] that deals repeated [DamagePhysical/] Kinetic damage.

You always cherished your [AbilityGreen]Assault Bike[/AbilityGreen], and through some special connections, you were able to bring it with you.[br/][br/]You have the following skills:[br/][AbilityGreen]Piloting[/AbilityGreen] - enables the Commander to ride basic vehicles and mounts.[br/][AbilityGreen]Vitality I and II[/AbilityGreen] - greatly increases your maximum [hp/] Hit Points.[br/][br/]The loadout includes:[br/]Your [AbilityGreen]Assault Bike[/AbilityGreen], which possesses powerful [DamageThermal/] Laser capabilities plus a [AbilityGreen]Mod.[/AbilityGreen][br/]An [AbilityGreen]Imperial Revolver[/AbilityGreen] that deals [DamagePhysical/] Kinetic damage to a single target.

You were a grand scientist, but they despised you due to your [AbilityGreen]Chopper[/AbilityGreen]. Now is the time to prove to them that your modified combat vehicle is all you need.[br/][br/]You have the following skills:[br/][AbilityGreen]Piloting[/AbilityGreen] - enables the Commander to ride basic vehicles and mounts.[br/][AbilityGreen]Vitality I and II[/AbilityGreen] - greatly increases your maximum [hp/] Hit Points.[br/][br/]The loadout includes:[br/]Your [AbilityGreen]Chopper[/AbilityGreen], which possesses powerful [DamagePhysical/] Kinetic capabilities plus a [AbilityGreen]Mod.[/AbilityGreen][br/]An [AbilityGreen]Arc Grenade[/AbilityGreen] that deals [DamageWave/] Arc damage and staggers those hit.

During a terrible battle, an Emergent saved your life. It later grew into an [AbilityGreen]Abyssian[/AbilityGreen]. You have been together ever since.[br/][br/]You have the following skills:[br/][AbilityGreen]Piloting[/AbilityGreen] - enables the Commander to ride basic vehicles and mounts.[br/][AbilityGreen]Vitality I and II[/AbilityGreen] - greatly increases your maximum [hp/] Hit Points.[br/][br/]The loadout includes:[br/]Your [AbilityGreen]Abyssian[/AbilityGreen], which possesses powerful [DamageBio/] Biochemical capabilities plus a [AbilityGreen]Mod.[/AbilityGreen][br/]A [AbilityGreen]Psi-stone of Dissonance[/AbilityGreen] that deals [DamagePsyche/] Psionic damage in an area.

You have your own personal [AbilityGreen]Lancer[/AbilityGreen]. You still remember when it was just a zygote in the birthing chambers. You have been inseparable ever since.[br/][br/]You have the following skills:[br/][AbilityGreen]Piloting[/AbilityGreen] - enables the Commander to ride basic vehicles and mounts.[br/][AbilityGreen]Vitality I and II[/AbilityGreen] - greatly increases your maximum [hp/] Hit Points.[br/][br/]The loadout includes:[br/]Your [AbilityGreen]Lancer[/AbilityGreen], which possesses powerful [DamageThermal/] Thermal capabilities plus a [AbilityGreen]Mod.[/AbilityGreen][br/]A [AbilityGreen]Bio Blaster[/AbilityGreen] that deals [DamageBio/] Biochemical damage.

Built with blood, sweat and tears, your [AbilityGreen]Bulwark[/AbilityGreen] is your greatest creation yet. Now let's see how it fights![br/][br/]You have the following skills:[br/][AbilityGreen]Piloting[/AbilityGreen] - enables the Commander to ride basic vehicles and mounts.[br/][AbilityGreen]Vitality I and II[/AbilityGreen] - greatly increases your maximum [hp/] Hit Points.[br/][br/]The loadout includes:[br/]Your [AbilityGreen]Bulwark[/AbilityGreen], which possesses powerful [DamagePhysical/] Kinetic capabilities plus a [AbilityGreen]Mod.[/AbilityGreen][br/]A [AbilityGreen]Basic Grenade[/AbilityGreen] that deals [DamagePhysical/] Kinetic damage in an area and staggers those hit.

Your parents gave you a [AbilityGreen]Hoverbike[/AbilityGreen] for your 16th birthday... they couldn't even get it in the right color, but you persevered and became an expert at riding it.[br/][br/]You have the following skills:[br/][AbilityGreen]Piloting[/AbilityGreen] - enables the Commander to ride basic vehicles and mounts.[br/][AbilityGreen]Vitality I and II[/AbilityGreen] - greatly increases your maximum [hp/] Hit Points.[br/][br/]The loadout includes:[br/]Your [AbilityGreen]Hoverbike[/AbilityGreen], which possesses powerful [DamagePsyche/] Psionic capabilities plus a [AbilityGreen]Mod.[/AbilityGreen][br/][AbilityGreen]Arc Bolas[/AbilityGreen] that deal [DamageWave/] Arc damage and has a chance to immobilize the target.

You found a lost [AbilityGreen]Imperial APC[/AbilityGreen] and repaired it.[br/][br/]You have the following skills:[br/][AbilityGreen]Piloting[/AbilityGreen] - enables the Commander to ride basic vehicles and mounts.[br/][AbilityGreen]Vitality I and II[/AbilityGreen] - greatly increases your maximum [hp/] Hit Points.[br/][br/]The loadout includes:[br/]An [AbilityGreen]Imperial APC[/AbilityGreen] with various support abilities.[br/]A [AbilityGreen]Basic Grenade[/AbilityGreen] that deals [DamagePhysical/] Kinetic damage in an area and staggers those hit.

The pack you received after the Xenoplague Close Combat training.[br/][br/]This expert training gives you the following skills:[br/][AbilityGreen]Close Quarter Specialist I[/AbilityGreen] - increases damage dealt when using Melee Weapons.[br/][AbilityGreen]Vitality I[/AbilityGreen] - increases your maximum [hp/] Hit Points.[br/][br/]The pack includes:[br/][AbilityGreen]Pestilence[/AbilityGreen], a vicious living gauntlet that infects your foes while dealing [DamageBio/] Biochemical damage at close range.[br/]A [AbilityGreen]Bio Grenade[/AbilityGreen] that deals [DamageBio/] Biochemical damage in an area and has a chance to poison those hit.

The pack you received after Voidtech Close Combat training.[br/][br/]This expert training gives you the following skills:[br/][AbilityGreen]Close Quarter Specialist I[/AbilityGreen] - increases damage dealt when using Melee Weapons.[br/][AbilityGreen]Vitality I[/AbilityGreen] - increases your maximum [hp/] Hit Points.[br/][br/]The pack includes:[br/] [AbilityGreen]Void Blades[/AbilityGreen], dimension-distorting blades that deal [DamagePhysical/] Kinetic damage at close range.[br/]An [AbilityGreen]Arc Grenade[/AbilityGreen] that deals [DamageWave/] Arc damage and staggers those hit.

The pack you received after Celestian Close Combat training.[br/][br/]This expert training gives you the following skills:[br/][AbilityGreen]Close Quarter Specialist I[/AbilityGreen] - increases damage dealt when using Melee Weapons.[br/][AbilityGreen]Vitality I[/AbilityGreen] - increases your maximum [hp/] Hit Points.[br/][br/]The pack includes:[br/] [AbilityGreen]Inferno Fists[/AbilityGreen], fiery gauntlets that deal [DamageThermal/] Thermal damage at close range.[br/]An [AbilityGreen]Ego Bomb[/AbilityGreen] that deals [DamagePsyche/] and has a chance of applying Broken Mind to those hit.

The pack you received after Promethean Assault training.[br/][br/]This expert training gives you the following skills:[br/][AbilityGreen]Ranged Specialist[/AbilityGreen] - increases damage dealt when using Ranged Weapons.[br/][AbilityGreen]Steady Aim[/AbilityGreen] - increases your accuracy when behind cover.[br/][br/]The pack includes:[br/]A [AbilityGreen]Purifier Gun[/AbilityGreen] that deals a burst of [DamageThermal/] Thermal damage.[br/]A [AbilityGreen]Thermal Grenade[/AbilityGreen] that deals [DamageThermal/] Thermal damage in an area and has a chance to burn those hit.

The pack you received after Psynumbra Assault training.[br/][br/]This expert training gives you the following skills:[br/][AbilityGreen]Ranged Specialist[/AbilityGreen] - increases damage dealt when using Ranged Weapons.[br/][AbilityGreen]Steady Aim[/AbilityGreen] - increases your accuracy when behind cover.[br/][br/]The pack includes:[br/]A [AbilityGreen]Soul Splitter[/AbilityGreen], a gun that targets the mind of its foes, dealing [DamagePsyche/] Psionic damage.[br/]A [AbilityGreen]Psi-stone of Dissonance[/AbilityGreen] that deals [DamagePsyche/] Psionic damage in an area.

The pack you received after Synthesis Assault training.[br/][br/]This expert training gives you the following skills:[br/][AbilityGreen]Ranged Specialist[/AbilityGreen] - increases damage dealt when using Ranged Weapons.[br/][AbilityGreen]Steady Aim[/AbilityGreen] - increases your accuracy when behind cover.[br/][br/]The pack includes:[br/]A [AbilityGreen]Hasher SMG[/AbilityGreen], a powerful submachine gun that deals [DamageWave/] Arc damage.[br/]An [AbilityGreen]Arc Grenade[/AbilityGreen] that deals [DamageWave/] Arc damage and staggers those hit.
